title: Hopefully this should be easy.
content:
Hi, Ran this through Whatthefont and it couldn't give me a match. Looks really familiar though.

Thanks.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014031528im_/http:/typophile.com/files/letters_4103.jpg)
author: myoung

comments.content:
I'll second that - it is Cronos.

JH

Nice.  
I new it looked familiar. Amazing how fonts can look different depending on how their used. All uppercase and tracked out, Cronos looks rather formal.

Thanks for the fast reply.

Michael
